news.title: Paramount to cut 3% of U.S. workforce as it deepens cost-cutting
news.summary: . It's the latest round of layoffs at Paramount as it contends with cord-cutting and prepares to merge with Skydance Media.

news.title: As GOP weighs Obamacare cuts, the party's constituents are more likely to use marketplace coverage, poll finds
news.summary: Republicans are considering a massive domestic policy bill that would slash funding for Affordable Care Act exchanges. But many GOP voters rely on them, and the bill would hurt them.

news.title: Anduril tops 2025 CNBC Disruptor 50 list as interest and investment in defense tech booms
news.summary: Anduril is the No. 1 2025 CNBC Disruptor 50 company as the ties between Silicon Valley technology and the U.S. military increase.

news.title: Apple's WWDC underwhelms on AI, but software gets biggest facelift in over a decade
news.summary: Apple investors waiting for the company to make a big push in artificial intelligence didn't have much reason for excitement at WWDC. Apple is expected to unveil a new version of its iOS operating system on June 12.

news.title: Why the Switch 2 is so important for Nintendo
news.summary: Nintendo just released the Switch 2, its first new game console in eight years. Can it live up to the popularity of the first Switch?

news.title: My friend is getting divorced. Her husband offered to sign over their house. What’s he hiding?
news.summary: After a friend said that perhaps she’ll just settle for the house, her husband agreed and moved to file for divorce quickly. “After my friend said. perhaps she will just settle. for the home,” her husband said, “her husband agreed.”

news.title: Fund manager who sold Tesla, just in time, says investors are overlooking these tech bargains
news.summary: The Future Funds’ Gary Black is waiting for Tesla to get a lot cheaper. Black is filling his funds with big tech bargains.

news.title: Folgers coffee, Jif peanut butter parent aims to absorb some tariff costs for shoppers
news.summary: Smucker's revenue outlook more closely matches Wall Street analyst estimates than its profit view. Smucker wants to keep prices as low as possible.

news.title: Here’s how often V-shaped recoveries like April’s occur
news.summary: Kristina Hooper, chief market strategist at hedge-fund manager Man Group, crunched the numbers on V-shaped stock-market recoveries.

news.title: A rare space IPO is on deck. It could herald a wave of space-tech companies going public.
news.summary: Voyager Technology is set to go public this week, and could trigger a wave of other space-tech IPOs. Voyager Technology will be listed on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol "Voyage"
